column4: if you just do the apt-get with the practice run you can get the package names for the ones it'll install, and you can always just download them all
question, how do i change the repositories used, right now it points to the install cd (cdrom://) and i'm having problems with missing packages
synaptic>settings>repo's the very first tab will have an option for the CD .. uncheck it. reload
edit your /etc/apt/sources.list and add a # on the line that calls for the CD
